articles.title: Greetings to Governor-General of Australia
articles.content:
Greetings to Governor-General of Australia
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Quentin Bryce, governor-general of Australia, on its national day.
					Kim in the message wished the friendly Australian people progress and prosperity.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Learns about Progress Made in Construction of Mansudae Area
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Learns about Progress Made in Construction of Mansudae Area
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim on Jan. 25 learned on the spot about the huge construction of the Mansudae area now under way on the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					All the builders of the Mansudae area are now performing miracles and innovations day by day in the run-up to the significant Day of the Sun with the single desire to convey leader Kim Jong Il's legends about love for the people to posterity.
					
					Modern buildings are taking their magnificent shapes in the Mansudae area as required by the new century thanks to the devoted efforts of the builders to successfully materialize Kim Jong Il's grand plan for the construction of the capital city.
					
					Going round the exterior of the construction site and the interior of apartment houses, the premier stressed the need for all the builders to finish the buildings on the highest level ahead of schedule true to the behests of Kim Jong Il who devoted his all to providing the people with the best and most wonderful gifts.
					
					Earlier, the premier acquainted himself on the spot with the project for renovating and expanding Kim Hyong Jik University of Education.
					
					Making the rounds of different places of the university now under construction on an expansion basis as intended by Kim Jong Il who worked heart and soul for the education of the younger generation, the premier convened a consultative meeting.
					
					The meeting underscored the need for all the officials and builders to ensure the speed and quality of the project and took specific measures calling on the relevant units to supply sufficient building materials needed for the project.

articles.title: Sports Contest among Officials of National Institutions Opens
articles.content:
Sports Contest among Officials of National Institutions Opens
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- The 17th Paektusan Prize Sports Contest among Officials of National Institutions opened with due ceremony at Kim Il Sung Square in Pyongyang on Thursday. 
					The contest is an annual event to celebrate the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					It will see the competition in basketball, volleyball, table tennis, tennis, badminton, Taekwon-Do and group running. 
					
					Present at the ceremony were Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Ri Yong Su, department director of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee, officials of ministries, national institutions and relevant fields, players and working people in the city.
					
					Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, made an opening address.

articles.title: Waterway to Be Built in South Hwanghae Province, DPRK
articles.content:
Waterway to Be Built in South Hwanghae Province, DPRK
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- A gravity-fed waterway will be built in South Hwanghae Province.
					It is another gigantic nature-remaking project in the era of Songun as part of the far-sighted nature-harnessing plan of leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					The completion of the waterway will help sufficiently irrigate tens of thousands of hectares of farmland and tideland-turned rice fields including those in Ongjin, Kangryong, Pyoksong and other several counties to ensure a safe and high yield of grain. 
					
					It will also help save tens of thousands of kilowatt of electricity and make a great contribution to the economic development and improvement of people's living standard by preventing the damage by flood in the area along Jaeryong River. 
					
					A ground-breaking ceremony took place in Haeju City on Thursday.
					
					Present there were Choe Yong Rim, Kim Ki Nam and other senior officials and officials of ministries and national institutions, builders and working people.

articles.title: New Postage Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Postage Stamps Issued
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- The DPRK State Stamp Bureau brought out two stamps portraying Mt. Paektu.
					The stamps contain views of Mt. Paektu seen from Lake Samji, one of the scenic spots in the country, and Lake Chon on the top of the mountain. 
					
					Mt. Paektu in Samjiyon County, Ryanggang Province, is the highest mountain in Korea, 2 750 meters above the sea.
					
					The mountain is associated with the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung for the liberation of the country from the Japanese colonial rule. Leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace is also in the mountain.
					
					The mountain is one of the famous tourist attractions in the country.  
					
					The State Stamp Bureau also issued four stamps with pictures of butterflies living in various countries.

articles.title: Song Based on Kim Jong Il's Love for People
articles.content:
Song Based on Kim Jong Il's Love for People
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- The song "When Snow Falls Down" has frequently been included in Pyongyang's TV music programs in snowy days.  
					It is a famous song reflecting the noble traits of leader Kim Jong Il sitting up all night in deep meditation for the people. It mirrors his great efforts for glorifying socialist Korea.
					
					The song also represents the Korean people's deep reverence for the leader devoting his all to their happiness, through their feelings about snow. 
					
					It reminds the Korean people of his deep love for them.

articles.title: Metal Wall Hanging, Gift to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Metal Wall Hanging, Gift to Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- The 6th Pyongyang Film Festival of the Non-aligned and Other Developing Nations took place in the DPRK in September Juche 87 (1998).
					The head of a Malaysian delegation, who had respected DPRK leader Kim Jong Il as a master of literature and arts and a great teacher, decided to make a present to him during his visit to Pyongyang for the festival.
					
					His decision enjoyed full support from other members of the delegation.
					
					Officials of the General Movie Bureau of Malaysia also joined them in preparing the gift.
					
					They gave a special order for a metal wall hanging to a famous souvenir factory.
					
					Carved on the hanging were the Monument to the State in Kuala Lumpur, Assembly Hall, temple, stone fortress built in 1511 and some other famous monuments in Malaysia.
					
					Asking a DPRK official to convey the gift to Kim Jong Il, the head of the delegation wished good health to him. He also sincerely hoped that the Korean people would make great achievements in socialist construction under his leadership.
					
					The gift is exhibited in the International Friendship Exhibition House.

articles.title: Choreographic Score Program Developed
articles.content:
Choreographic Score Program Developed
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- The Phibada Opera Troupe of the DPRK recently developed a choreographic score program with the help of researchers of the State Academy of Sciences.
					The software was made on the basis of alphabetic symbols of dance notation created in the country decades ago.
					
					Ri Kyong Hui, a section chief of the troupe, told KCNA that the program makes it possible to make out, edit and print any dance pieces into score.
					
					She said the program marks dance movements simply to understand with reduced symbols.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Studied
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Studied
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting to hear the recorded speech of President Kim Il Sung's work "On the Thorough Implementation of the Principles of Socialist Education", speech delivered at a national meeting of teachers on Dec. 27, Juche 60 (1971), took place at the People's Palace of Culture Thursday.
					The work deals at length with the purpose, new education theory and method and contents of education in socialist society.
					
					The President said that the main principle of socialist education is to educate school youth and children in a socialist manner so as to thoroughly revolutionize them and assimilate them to working-class.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il saw to it that officials in the field of education heard the recorded speech of the President on the 40th anniversary of the publication of the work last year.
					
					Present at the meeting were Choe Hui Jong, department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Song Ja Rip, minister of Higher Education who doubles as president of Kim Il Sung University, officials of party and power bodies and the educational field and teachers and researchers at schools at various levels in Pyongyang.
					
					The participants heard the recorded speech.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on Japan Media's Impudent Action
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on Japan Media's Impudent Action
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Conservative media of Japan are getting evermore pronounced in their hostile action after the DPRK suffered a great national loss.
					Early in January Jiji Press talked nonsense about "acting for people", hurting the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership. Meanwhile Tokyo Shimbun parroted the false data cooked up by human scum of south Korea.
					
					On Jan. 22 Asahi Shimbun, reduced to a waiting maid of the right-wing forces, invented a rumor about the Chinese army's "possible entry into Pyongyang" in case of "emergency" in the DPRK.
					
					The facts fully show the sinister and dirty nature of Japanese conservative media.
					
					There are many countries and media in the world, but such impudent media are rare as Japan's conservative media which rubbed salt into the wounds of the people of neighboring country in mourning.
					
					The world is clearly seeing the trifling and inferior nature of media of Japan, a politically minor country.
					
					The Japanese conservative forces are intensifying through reptile means the smear campaign based on distorted and false information in a bid to incite distrust and hostility toward the DPRK worldwide and attain their scheme to stifle it. The said report aimed to drive a wedge between the DPRK and China, too, was a revelation of their hostile attempt to isolate the DPRK externally and check the vigorous advance of its army and people.
					
					This is a vicious political provocation as well as an act of terrorism and aggression against the DPRK.
					
					Such actions aggravating the DPRK-Japan relations are not in accord with the demand of the era for detente in Northeast Asia, and they will bring nothing good to Japan.
					
					Though the Japanese reactionaries are doing the DPRK something mean, its army and people will dynamically advance in higher spirit.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun: Reconciliation and Unity--Key to National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun: Reconciliation and Unity--Key to National Reunification
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun in a bylined article on Thursday stresses that national reconciliation and unity are the key to Korea's reunification.
					The cause of reunifying Korea means, in essence, a nationwide cause whereby to connect the vein of the nation divided into the north and the south by outsiders and realize their unity, the article says, adding:
					
					The national reconciliation and unity serve as an asset for laying solid foundation of reunification and prosperity.
					
					Due to the national division by outside forces, differing ideologies and systems have existed in the north and the south of Korea, but they can never be reason and conditions for the Korean nation to fail to achieve its reconciliation and unity.
					
					To promote national reconciliation and unity is an important way for settling the issue of the national destiny independently and peacefully by the united efforts of the Koreans. 
					
					The national reunification is a nationwide independent cause that can be accomplished only by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation. No one can replace the Koreans in the struggle for national reunification.
					
					It is none other than the Koreans who want to see the national reunification and should play the role of its performer and will get benefits from it. Only when all Koreans unite themselves closely as the driving forces of national reunification and strengthen the forces in every way, is it possible to realize the country's reunification successfully.
					
					The stirring reality in the June 15 era of reunification that made long strides in the idea of "By our nation itself" clearly proves that the Korean nation can smash the moves of the separatists at home and abroad and vigorously advance the national reunification movement when all its members get reconciled and united with each other, well aware of their position and role as the master responsible for national reunification.

articles.title: Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from S. Korea Demanded
articles.content:
Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from S. Korea Demanded
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., on Jan. 23 carried an article demanding the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea.
					All the compatriots in the north, the south and overseas want to terminate the tragedy of the national division at an early date and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification, the article said, adding:
					
					It is the way of realizing this desire to force the U.S. forces to pull out of south Korea.
					
					The article called upon all the compatriots to reject outside forces and create a new history of national reunification through great national unity.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Stage Shelling Exercises on Islands in West Sea of Korea
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Stage Shelling Exercises on Islands in West Sea of Korea
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- The marine corps of the south Korean army Thursday staged shelling exercises under the simulated conditions of preemptive attack on the DPRK on Paekryong and Yonphyong islands in the West Sea of Korea, according to south Korean KBS. 
					Forces of the marine corps deployed on those islands fired live shells with different types of artillery pieces for hours towards waters around them, kicking up war fever. 
					
					Traitor Lee Myung Bak harbored grudge against the north when the south Korean army was hit hard for preempting shelling into territorial waters of its side from Yonphyong Island in November 2010. He has since waited for a chance of provocation, grumbling "he feels towering grudge" and "his patience is exhausted." 
					
					Consequently, the cases of exercises for attack on the north from the five islands in the West Sea of Korea have increased unprecedentedly. 
					
					Large-scale exercises for preemptive attack were staged in November last year with armed forces of various services involved under the simulated conditions of the shelling on Yonphyong Island a year ago, creating a touch-and-go situation. 
					
					This year the group of traitors openly disclosed their plan to stage regularly every year field mobile exercises with main emphasis on discussing tactics with the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces on those islands, spying on terrain and escalating naval firing drills. 
					
					They are spreading rumor that they stand for dialogue with the DPRK, while working hard to recreate through maneuvers for a war of aggression the same situation as what happened after the Yonphyong Island shelling incident. However, all Koreans and the rest of the world clearly see through the shameless and bellicose true colors of the group.

articles.title: Events on Day of Shining Star Held in Different Countries
articles.content:
Events on Day of Shining Star Held in Different Countries
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- A lecture and round-table talks took place in Brazil and the Czech Republic on Jan. 15 and 19 on the Day of the Shining Star.
					Present there were officials of the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea, the newspaper Dialog of the Czech Republic and the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association and masses.
					
					The chairman of the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea said in his lecture:
					
					It is almost one month since Kim Jong Il, the great leader and father of the Korean people, passed away.
					
					The Korean people are holding him in high esteem.
					
					Feb. 16 this year is his 70th birth anniversary.
					
					The DPRK instituted his birth anniversary as the Day of the Shining Star. On this occasion we will give wide publicity to his idea and feats.
					
					The editor-in-chief of Dialog noted:
					
					The demise of Kim Jong Il who wisely led the Korean revolution and the world revolution in the forefront to defend socialism from imperialism is a great loss not only to the Korean people but to the Czech revolutionaries and the international labor movement.
					
					We are convinced that the socialist cause and the revolutionary cause of Juche which were pioneered by President Kim Il Sung and led by Kim Jong Il are sure to win as the dear respected Kim Jong Un, who is identical to Kim Jong Il, is standing at the head of the Workers' Party of Korea, the state, the army and the people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Birth Anniversaries of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il to Be Commemorated in Brazil
articles.content:
Birth Anniversaries of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il to Be Commemorated in Brazil
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- A Brazilian national preparatory committee was inaugurated with due ceremony in Sao Paulo on Jan. 18 to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The preparatory committee is made up of representatives of the Brazilian Communist Party, the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, the Communist Party of Brazil, the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK and the Brazil-Korea Friendship Association.
					
					The ceremony elected Emilia Fernandes, co-chairwoman of the international preparatory committee to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, chairwoman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The preparatory committee decided to organize colorful events including meeting, seminar, photo exhibition and film show and widely introduce and disseminate the immortal exploits of the peerlessly great persons through media on the significant anniversaries.

articles.title: Cuban Magazine Supports DPRK's Cause
articles.content:
Cuban Magazine Supports DPRK's Cause
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Cuban magazine Bohemia No. 1 carried an article titled "DPRK invariably keeping to its path" illustrated with a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un standing on the tribune of honor of Kim Il Sung Square.
					The article said:
					
					Although the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il passed away, the Korean people have supported the new leadership invariably defending socialism.
					
					World media, reporting about this, said that the will of the DPRK to continue the revolution despite difficulties was expressed.
					
					Voices are heard from the DPRK that tasks given by the new leader will be successfully carried out.
					
					Ceaseless military maneuvers have been staged by the U.S. and south Korea which have so far kept asserting the nukes of the DPRK pose a "threat" to the region. But they are not mentioning even a word about the fact that the saber-rattling is threatening the stability of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					Looking back on history, the U.S. has attached great importance to holding its supremacy in the peninsula, to begin with.
					
					Deeply aware of this, the Workers' Party of Korea and people know well they should deal with provocations from outside with strong hands.
					
					It is nonsensical that the above-said provocations will make them lower their vigilance.
					
					The Korean people will get united closer every moment and do everything better in the future.
					
					They will continue to advance under the uplifted banner of independence with firm faith and love for their motherland.

articles.title: Reception Marks Day of Republic of India
articles.content:
Reception Marks Republic Day of India
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Pratap Singh, Indian ambassador to the DPRK, arranged a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Jan. 26, the Republic Day of India.
					Present there on invitation were Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister, Pak Kun Gwang, vice-department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Song Gi, vice-foreign minister, Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the DPRK-India Friendship Association who is also vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for the Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and officials concerned and foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here.
					
					On hand were staff members of the Indian embassy here.

articles.title: Iran to Block Strait of Hormuz in Response to U.S. Threats: Ambassador
articles.content:
Iran to Block Strait of Hormuz in Response to U.S. Threats: Ambassador
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Iran would block the Strait of Hormuz in response to possible security threats from the United States, Iranian Ambassador to Russia Seyyed Mahmoud Reza Sajjadi said recently.
					He said Iran would take countermeasures if the U.S. struck the country's nuclear facilities.
					
					"If Iran feels that its security is threatened, it is natural that Iran considers itself entitled to respond and give an appropriate answer," he said, adding that Iran has enough power to block the strait for "self-defense."

articles.title: Economic Depression in U.S. and Japan
articles.content:
Economic Depression in U.S. and Japan
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Eastman Kodak Co., the pioneering photography firm of the United States, said on Jan. 19 it has filed for bankruptcy protection.
					The company accrued $6.75 billion of liabilities as of the end of September last year.
					
					Department store sales in Japan fell 2.0 percent in 2011 from the year before on a same-store basis, declining for the 15th consecutive year due to tepid consumer spending by the economic depression, according to the Japan Department Stores Association on Jan. 19.

articles.title: Embajador indio ofrece banquete por efemeride nacional
articles.content:
Embajador indio ofrece banquete por efemeride nacional
Pyongyang, 26 de enero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia de la Republica de la India, el embajador indio en Corea, Pratap Singh, ofrecio el dia 26 una recepcion en el Club para el Cuerpo Diplomatico Taedonggang.
					Fueron invitados a la ocasion el canciller Pak Ui Chun, el subjefe de departamento del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Pak Kun Gwang, el vicecanciller Kim Song Gi, el vicepresidente del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-India, Kim Jin Bom, y otros funcionarios coreanos, los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y los delegados de organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea.
					
					Tambien estuvieron presentes los miembros de la sede diplomatica india.

articles.title: Premier coreano recorre campo de construccion de zona Mansudae
articles.content:
Premier coreano recorre campo de construccion de zona Mansudae
Pyongyang, 26 de enero (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Chae Yong Rim analizo en el terreno el dia 25 el estado de construccion de la zona Mansudae que se realiza con motivo del centenario de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					Todos los constructores crean cada dia milagros e innovaciones con la decision de transmitir leyenda de amor al pueblo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il con motivo del Dia del Sol (15 de abril).
					
					Gracias a ingentes esfueros de los constructores entusiasmados por realizar con brillantez el magno proyecto del Dirigente en materia de construccion capitalina, en la zona Mansudae se ven los modernos edificios arquitectonicos convenientes a la demanda del nuevo siglo.
					
					Recorriendo el exterior del campo de construccion y los interiores de las viviendas, Chae destaco la necesidad de terminar la obra en el maximo nivel en acato al legado del Dirigente quien dedico todo lo suyo por ofrecer al pueblo coreano lo mejor en el mundo.
					
					Con anterioridad, Choe se entero sobre el terreno del estado de la obra de reconstruccion de la Universidad Pedagogica Kim Hyong Jik.
					
					El premier recorrio varios lugares de la universidad que se reconstruye segun el noble proposito del Dirigente quien siempre prestaba gran atencion a la labor docente de las generaciones venideras y convoco una reunion de consulta.
					
					En la ocasion se abordo el tema de asegurar en el maximo nivel la velocidad y calidad de la obra y fueron tomadas las medidas minuciosas para que las unidades concernientes suministren con satisfaccion los materiales necesarios a la construccion.

articles.title: Belicistas surcoreanos libran canonazos en las islas del Mar Oeste
articles.content:
Belicistas surcoreanos libran canonazos en las islas del Mar Oeste
Pyongyang, 26 de enero (ACNC) -- La radiodifusion surcoreana KBS reporto que las fuerzas navales surcoreanas desarrollaron el dia 26 en las islas Paekryong y Yonphyong del Mar Oeste de Corea los ejercicios de canonazos suponiendo el ataque preventivo a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Ellos dispararon en varias horas los proyectiles reales a las areas maritimas de sus contornos movilizando toda clase de canones ubicados en esas islas.
					
					En noviembre de 2010 los titeres surcoreanos estacionados en el islote Yonphyong se atrevieron a disparar canonazos hacia las aguas jurisdiccionales de la parte Norte, pero de inmediato recibieron el ataque de represalia de esta.  
					
					Desde entonces, la banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak ha venido acechando la oportunidad de vengarlo diciendo que el caso de canonazos del Norte le resentia tanto y no podia contener el rencor.
					
					De esta manera, en 5 islas del Mar Oeste de Corea frecuentaron los ejercicios de ataque de agresion al Norte.
					
					En el noviembre pasado, los belicistas surcoreanos libraron los ejercicios de ataque preventivo de gran envergadura con la introduccion de las fuerzas de diversos tipos de ejercito suponiendo las circunstancias del caso de canonazo en la isla Yonphyong de hace un ano, lo que creo la situacion muy delicada.
					
					Este ano, la banda traidora planeo desarrollar cada ano en estas islas el simulacro de movimiento al aire libre enfocando principalmente en el debate sobre la estrategia con las tropas agresoras norteamericanas, el reconocimiento topografico y la ampliacion del entrenamiento de tiro maritimo.
					
					Todos los hechos revelan claramente la naturaleza descarada y belica de la banda traidora que difunde el rumor como si deseara dialogar con la RPDC, pero de hecho, trata de representar el caso de canonazos en la isla Yonphyong con los ejercicios de guerra de agresion al Norte.

articles.title: ACNC desmiente informaciones de los medios de Japon
articles.content:
ACNC desmiente informaciones de los medios de Japon
Pyongyang, 26 de enero (ACNC) -- Despues del gran duelo nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se tornan cada vez mas abiertos los actos hostiles de los medios conservadores japoneses.
					A principios de enero, Jiji difundio una chismografia bajo el titular de "Orquestar el pensamiento del pueblo" ofendiendo la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					Poco despues, Tokio Shimbun se hizo eco de los disparates de unas escorias humanas del Sur de Corea.
					
					El dia 22, Asahi Shimbun, rotativo convertido en la sirvienta de las fuerzas derechistas, invento el rumor de la "posible entrada a Pyongyang" de las tropas chinas hablando de la supuesta "situacion emergente".
					
					En este mundo hay muchos paises y medios de informacion masiva.
					
					Pero, los medios conservadores de Japon son los mas degenerados e inmorales que insultan al pais vecino enlutado todavia.
					
					El mundo esta viendo esta vez el caracter mezquino y malsano de esos medios de ese pais enano en el plano politico.
					
					Tal demagogia basada en fraudes y tergiversaciones parte del intento de las fuerzas conservadoras de Japon de internacionalizar la desconfianza y hostilidad a la RPDC y atropellarla finalmente. 
					
					La citada informacion mentirosa encaminada a meter cizanas en las relaciones Corea-China, obedece al designio de aislar en la arena internacional a la RPDC y frenar el avance impetuoso del ejercito y el pueblo de esta.
					
					Todo eso constituye una brutal provocacion politica y un acto terrorista y agresivo contra la RPDC, lo que agrava las relaciones entre esta y Japon.
					
					Ademas, no conviene a la demanda de la epoca aspirante al alivio de la tension del Nordeste Asiatico ni dara resultados positivos a Japon.
					
					Cuanto mas disgustados se pongan los reaccionarios japoneses, tanto mas dinamico sera el avance del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
